articles.title: Ryder Cup 2020: USA dominate opening day to build 6-2 lead over Europe at Whistling Straits - Sky Sports
articles.description: Europe made a nightmare start to their Ryder Cup title defence to fall 6-2 behind after an opening day dominated by Team USA at Whistling Straits.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch’s Sega Genesis controller has six buttons only in Japan - Polygon
articles.description: Fans in the rest of the world — including North America and Europe — will have to make do with the three-button Genesis gamepad for Nintendo Switch Online retro games.
articles.content: When Sega Genesis games arrive on Nintendo Switch Online next month, Switch owners in most regions will have to play them with three-button Genesis controllers. Nintendo is producing a six-button ver… [+1977 chars]
